title: Kweek
author: Kweek
content: About new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?

comments.author: fedelowe
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?After Binance has announced  an exclusive, multi-year NFT partnership with CR7, I'm looking for nfts, and project reptile chronicles looks really good, wanna hear your thoughts about it

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Always very interested with the ico that can make a partnership with the exchange site. This proves that the possiblity if the project to be successful is very high. The successful of ICO actually depend on the project itself. I can't deny the fact that if these days so many icos were trying to create partnership with the various decentralized exchange site as a way to raise the funds. The ROI from the ico is also depend with the hype around it. Sometime a very strong ico will be fully backed by some big name in the crypto

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?What interest me the most are Ventures Capital backing it because it only mean that the project has a huge startup funds to operate besides the additional funds coming from IDO/ICO, Most of the project that has good VC usually turns ito good outcome because they have enough resources to use for the project development and marketing at the same time. Startup project that solely relying on IDO funds usually died after a year since the operating cost and exchange listing is too much for them to handle while they are liquidating thre tokens to use as operational funds which always results to price dump of tokens up to the point that its already worthless.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: Now the hype is on all sorts of " walk and earn" nonsense. Probably only such ICOs or launchpads are now making good profits at the start of trading. I haven't heard of any other projects boasting about profits. Probably because the market is bearish and new altcoins, of which there are already an infinite number, are of little interest.

comments.author: ledu_ico
comments.body: Can we look into $LEDU?Having looked into the project, I really see that it's a one in a million project. A watch2earn project for developers, both for project creators or developers. They are really building the world’s biggest learning ecosystem for future technology.https://twitter.com/eduecosystem1/status/1537036542581129218?s=20&t=SyD2fA6Yus9saZr5-LhuVg

comments.author: funteki
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?I want to hear your thoughts on project "reptile chronicles" this looks good and media coverage is also good

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?For me ICO is a very risky gamble. Yes I am investors to most ICO and I could say not all are profitable and some really are down from its price. In order to pick a good project, you must taken into account a lot of factors.For example, team members and partners. Some really like to check whether the VC are those commonly dump their projects. But if you see a logo of a good VC make sure they are really into that partnership cause you might got faked because its quite easy to put a name and used someone company for their own sake.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Let's pay your attention on tokenomics of ICO. How is token distributed from seed, private to public sales?What are vesting terms for different types of investors? How long will it last? When the huge token amount will be released on the market as it can cause a massive dump when investors cash out and take profit.When you check block explorer, you must pay attention on top wallets to see whether that token has a fair launch, fair distribution. Lastly, make sure you pay attention on top wallets to see whether tokens are locked in smart contracts or not. Being locked means there are vesting terms that are good for retail investors. It will reduce risk of scam exit from core team members of that project.

comments.author: mumang siat
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?ICOs are dangerous enough to be used in conditions like now, many previous projects had a level of weakness involving them for now, of course, we don't have to calculate all of them in general and the same way. But if you look at it bigger, failure is bigger than success, the level of compatibility with the ICO no longer gets great support, of course this will affect the ICO journey in the future

comments.author: Lantind
comments.body: For now it is rare to get full support for ICOs on new projects, because now has a new method of coin development, we are not saying that the ICO is over, but the development of crypto now has new powers that at any time can leave the development of old methods, of course every year. new developments launched, will make old methods abandoned, not to mention the many shortcomings contained in the ICO itself, thus making people lose faith in the future

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: There are so many metrics being used by investors these days. I think that it can't be explained easily but the thing that i do believe as long as you have been getting so many supporters from the investors like private investors and im sure this can make ICO became successful. There were still icos that could reach the hardcap. You can even check it on some sites like icodrop and cryptorank. These are the most accurate ico listing sites.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO?What interests me most in ICO is the idea.  Is it innovative?  Is it feasible?  Will it cater enough audience?  Will it sell?  Will it compete in the market? Next is the Developer.  Are they capable? Are they really the people said on the project linkdn?Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PM What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? If you are asking the pros and cons of an ICO there are articles online that explain them. Pros/StrengthReadily accessible for investors and startup companiesAccessible onlineHigh liquidityLess paperworkHigh return of investmentCons/WeaknessVolatileA potential fraudMay lack accountabilityYou can read the detailed explanation here: ICO Pros and Cons: Is It Worth the Hype?Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAnd what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?I always wanted the ICO to have a lower value.  As an investor, I always want to have the maximum profit if possible.  Since ICO token is actually worthless before it was put into the market, I won't be convinced if the developer set a high price for the token.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?ICOs are 99.9999% scams.  Seriously unless you have money to literally burn I would stay away.  Especially in this Arles.  Bear markets are no time to take a stab at a risky unknown project just starting out.  They typically plummet as soon as the exchanges open for them.

comments.author: funteki
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?"reptile chronicles" is insane new project, I think this have future and even more

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?ICOs are already outdated, though you might still find a good project under that network and you just need to know their roadmap, their plans and the services they are offering in this market. If you see a great value for that and you think many trust the project then maybe you can also participate. In a bear market, I don’t usually invest on new projects because of the fear of losing everything since some investors are not focused on new projects, they also prefer the old projects because they usually survive the bear market.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Kweek on June 27, 2022, 07:56:06 PMAbout new cryptocurrencies what interests you most in an ICO? What strengths and weaknesses in the ICO? And what values ​​do you as an investor observe before acquiring a crypto asset before its launch?First of all i think the time of the traditional ICO's that we had in the years 2017 and 2018 are pretty much dead nowadays if i am not wrong. Back in the day most of those ICO's could be joined by anyone and most of the ICO's did not even have a hard cap back then which mean everyone could invest without limits. Like the Filecoin ICO that collected more than 250 Million $.Nowadays most of the projects are only doing small public rounds, which means that you either can only invest a very small amount if the project is very hyped and a lot of people want to invest or you need to join a lottery in order to be allowed to invest.You should always check the whitepaper, the roadmap, the team behind the project and also the tokenomics of a new project before you invest.

comments.author: dark1234
comments.body: everything has its time including selling new crypto on an ICO basis and for now no matter how good the project is when launching an ICO it will be rated negatively because of the impression of a scam contained in the ICO project but if you really want to join be careful and think twice carefully so you don't fall on a scam project  and in the current market it's better to join a presale on PancakeSwap or any other exchange because the price will follow the market
